comment.body:
> [p2p](#comment_27_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): when we want to enlarge user's space of forum ...

yeah,I agree.
Typing command is to make mistake usually.
Two buttons is easier.

> [p2p](#comment_28_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): 
> content.json
> data/users/content.json
> custom: ______________________________________________________   Sign Publish

O^O

> [p2p](#comment_29_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): i found another bug

really?I never edit myid/date.json and content.json , why you edit it ?

> [p2p](#comment_29_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): i found another bug

I think i know why you want to modify it  when i view http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NzWeweqJ32aRVdM5UzFnYCszuvG5xV3vS/?Topic:8_1M1c7x7SLau8D2bm8Gw8iWQbBqe9X4zqPw/+1. haha.

> [p2p](#comment_30_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): yes, when we want to make group posts, we have to sign data/users/youruserid/content.json

I succed setting my first ticky topic just now.
maybe a easier way to setting these is coming soon.
